Interrogations to the propounded to the Elroy Le Compte Francis Baptist Valle, Bartholomew Durreher and Joseph Bogy of the Lou of St. Genevieve and State of Missouri with helps to the produced sworn and examined in a certain cause at common law now pleading and undetermined in the United States district court for the County of Grant and territory of Wisconsin wherein Paul Jones a colored man is plantiff and George W. Jones is defendant on the part and in behalf of the laid defendant. ========
Ann a free black woman
vs.
H Haight
trespass Damages $500
Executed the 8th day of Octo 1816
Devine Sherrif Service $.80_ Mileage $.70
To the Clerk of the Circuit Court for St Charles County in Northern Circuit
Let a summons issue in this case
McGirk & Tom
Tompkins
Filed the 25th July 1816
William Christy Jr. Clerk
Received the within declaration with summons enclosed on the 28 th august 1816 and executed the same at the Residence of the defendant in the township of Portage Des Souix on the eighth day of October 1816
Devine Sheriff
